comment.author: 최덕선
comment.content: I know this agency very well, so if you need further information, just let me know.

post.content:
The opportunity is so start ASAP, 2 month contract (with strong chance of renewal) with 1 of North America's largest systems integrators. Thank you for your assistance.
Requirements: Java - (>5Y) Visual Age for Java (IBM) - (>5Y) Design - (>5Y) WebSphere - (>5Y) MQ Series - (>5Y) DB2 - (>5Y) LDAP - (>5Y) "Nice to have" skills Internal Description EXCLUSIVE AND VERY URGENT Must have VAJ (Visual Age for Java) Webshpere, MQ, DB2, (IBM Java Architecture), 2 months contract with option to extend. Core Toronto, Any insurance or Portal development is an instant hire.
Number of Positions 1
Role: Application Developer Scope of Work/Assignment Description 2 Major Service Request need to be completed. Need a senior Java Developer who requires little supervision.
Needs to be able to jump right into the role.
Skill Classification :
VAJ 3.0 3
Design Analysis 3
CVS 3
Development in Websphere 3.5.4, MQ, DB2, LDAP with VAJ. 3
Additional Nice to Have : UNIFI, experience with CSIO Portal
Jodi Kaufman Senior Resource Manager CNC Global Limited 60 Bloor Street West, Suite 1400 Toronto, Ontario M4W 3B8 p: 416.962.9262 ext.379 f: 416.962.4489 e: jkaufman@cncglobal.com
post.title: Contract opportunity (EXCLUSIVE AND VERY URGENT)
